extendedInfo.description: "The most intuitive, beautiful and simple to use Converter on the Play Store!"You can do almost any unit conversion with this unit converter. It's the only Converter in gorgeous Card UI, with superb usability and optimization for tablets. Convert all units easy and fast.Features:â Adfreeâ Unlimited Copy-Conversion (Copied values from any app are converted automatically)â Optimized layouts for phones, 7-inch Tablets and 10-inch Tabletsâ Card UI (also on devices before ICS)â Search for unitsâ Real-time conversion while typingâ Great usability:  - Add Favorites  - Lists your Most Used conversions  - Sort units by names or valuesâ 80+ Categories in 20+ Languagesâ 150+ Currency Exchange Ratesâ 1400+ UnitsPermissions:Network communication - get the latest Currency Exchange Rates, load adsHardware controls - give haptic feedback (vibrate)Run at startup - for Copy-Conversion

reviews.title: Missing only one thing to be perfect
reviews.comment: Dear developer, please give an option to reduce the number of decimal units! It\'s really confusing and unnecessary  to have 5 decimal digits, especially in currency converter. One or two is more then enough, or at least make the decimal numbers much smaller in size. Your font, as beautiful as it is, is rather thin so it\'s not very easy to see where the decimal dot is at a glance. I\'ll gladly update to 5 stars later! Otherwise, this is probably the prettiest and best converter I\'ve had the pleasure of using.
reviews.author: Drazen Stojcic

reviews.title: Great UI & Functional
reviews.comment: Best UI I\'ve seen in a conversion app for Android. There are also many units you can convert.
reviews.author: Alexx Bull

reviews.title: Runs in background
reviews.comment: The application is always running in the background (when viewed with a task manager)
reviews.author: Hany Nagaty

reviews.title: A great converter!
reviews.comment: I\'ve checked out many and this is by far the best I\'ve come acrosed.
reviews.author: Duane Dent

reviews.title: don\'t buy this - AdMob detected and that in the paid version
reviews.comment: I want my money back!!!  The pro version was installed on a different device and AdMob was detected. The developer is a liar.
reviews.author: Uurs Yar\'Aarne

reviews.title: Very well done app
reviews.comment: Excellent job. Modern and functional UI. Love it
reviews.author: George Dobrev

reviews.title: Textbook app construction.
reviews.comment: This app is intelligently and beautifully made. Form and function are perfect, plus it does copy conversion! Sweet and savory. Paid version all the way. I wish more apps were made this well.
reviews.author: Michael Cline

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I love the new \"card-style\" UI. One small criticism: the new keypad feels laggy when it pops up, at least on my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Essential tool
reviews.comment: Great app to keep handy on your phone, very polished ui
reviews.author: Andrew Jackson

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Best converter I tried. Very beautiful and perfectly built interface.
reviews.author: Marcio Curotto

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Nice functionality, maybe the best designed app in Google Play
reviews.author: Zacharias Einfeldt

reviews.title: Yay and nay!
reviews.comment: Awesome app, ugly icon. The icon makes the app look like it was made for Gingerbread and Froyo.
reviews.author: Randall Cipriano

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: But I recommend removing pro from the icon. As it stands the free version has a better looking icon as a result. If anything, that\'s the one that should be labeled with \"lite\"!  Great job otherwise!
reviews.author: David Prefer

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very nice UI.
reviews.author: Louie Ting

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Native UI is the best solution for modern Android apps. Huge amount of units...even the currency converter. Great!
reviews.author: Denis Timakov

reviews.title: Good update
reviews.comment: Latest update make it more practical and looks way better :-)
reviews.author: Viorel Bledea

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Could you add kWh in the energy section?
reviews.author: Jens Voshage

reviews.title: A diamond in the rough
reviews.comment: Why is this one of only 2 such apps that don\'t look like they were written in the Donut/Eclair era? The icon doesn\'t do it justice though and needs a redesign. The favourite page could do with work too. This section of the store is wide open.
reviews.author: Alexander Procter

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Was looking for a good unit converter app, with a tablet optimized UI and no ads.  This is it.    Works great so far.  I would like to see teaspoons, tablespoons and cups in the volume area though.  Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please
reviews.comment: I agree with with the reviewer who commented on the lack of converters that looked like they were made for ICS. Works great. Looks great.
reviews.author: tony ket
